name: Mastery Talisman: Dual-Pronged Approach
description: After you use a Skill: If your active character is being protected by a Shield, create 2 Omni Element and 1 Shield point. (Once per Round)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After you use a Skill:</color> If your active character is being protected by a $[K6], create 2 $[K411] and 1 $[K6] point. (Once per Round)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After you use a Skill:</color> If your active character is being protected by a {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color>, create 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color> and 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> point. (Once per Round)
